mapper.select: select t.toonNum, t.toonName, t.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, toonGenre, toonDes, toonGood, toonView, toonFin, toonDate, t.toonImg, t.toonThumbImg from tbl_toon t inner join toon_category c on t.cateCode = c.cateCode where t.cateCode = #{cateCode} or c.cateCodeRef = #{cateCodeRef}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (toonNum, userId, repNum, repCon) values (#{toonNum}, #{userId}, tbl_reply_seq.nextval, #{repCon})
mapper.select: select r.toonNum, r.userId, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repGood, r.repDate, m.userName from tbl_reply r inner join tbl_member m on r.userId = m.userId where toonNum = #{toonNum}
